SCSS,Floated,"What is the property for making that the element next to a floated one sorrounds it in a particular shape. Rememeber that it is necessary that the element is floated. Write an example for a circle (although it can be polygons or png images using the alpha channel). The circle shaped element should be 200px x 200px, green background, 50% border radious.
.circle{
